name: Dragon Egg
uniques: Guaranteed with Strategic Balance resource option
Minor deposits generated with weight [10] <in [Forest] tiles> <in tiles adjacent to [Mountain] tiles>
Minor deposits generated with weight [10] <in [Hill] tiles> <in tiles without [Forest]>
Appears more often in continents with more mountains
